titlestmt.titleproper: Monthly Meeting of Friends of Philadelphia Records undated
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Monthly Meeting of Friends of Philadelphia Records

scopecontent.p: Included are vital records, minutes of men's and women's meetings, committee, especially Joint Committee records, financial records, miscellaneous records and records of several schools for black children, especially Adelphi School. Although these are primarily the records of the Monthly Meeting of Friends of Philadelphia (Arch Street), there are also records of the Monthly Meeting of Friends for the Northern District, Monthly Meeting of Friends for the Southern District, Philadelphia Quarterly Meeting and Philadelphia Yearly Meeting.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
